reasoning: Follicular thyroid carcinoma comprises ~10-15% of thyroid cancers. Global thyroid cancer incidence ~10-12 per 100k (GLOBOCAN 2005), so FTC ~1.5 per 100k. Second most common thyroid malignancy after papillary type.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
